MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Armadale. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:27am due to an underground cable fault on Mayfield Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:16pm on Thursday, 11 March 2021
